Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.geometry

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.geometry.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Figure, Link

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A class of models for drawing. Each model has a label.

    • Field Summary

      static int charHeight

    • Method Detail

      • isHit

        public boolean isHit​(int x,
                     int y)
        Checks whether or not the given coordinate 'hits' this model.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to check with.
        y - The y coordinate to check with.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given coordinate lies within the confines of this model's bounds.

      • isLabelHit

        public boolean isLabelHit​(int x,
                          int y)
        Checks whether the given coordinate 'hits' this model's label.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to check with.
        y - The y coordinate to check with.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given coordinate is enclosed by this model's label.
